tool_description: Optimizes marketing budget allocation across content channels, content types, and campaigns based on historical performance, audience reach, and strategic priorities.

total_budget.description: Total content marketing budget to allocate

channels_performance_data.description: Historical performance data for each channel

strategic_priorities.description: Strategic priorities and weights (awareness, conversion, retention)

error_messages: Invalid budget amount: Total budget must be greater than 0.
Insufficient performance data: Provide performance data for at least 2 channels.
Budget too low: Total budget must exceed minimum_channel_budget Ã— number of channels.
Invalid risk tolerance: Choose from conservative, moderate, or aggressive.
Missing strategic priorities: Include at least one strategic priority.
usage: Specify total_budget, channels_performance_data, and strategic_priorities. Optionally set minimum_channel_budget and risk_tolerance. Returns optimized budget allocation recommendations.

channel_allocations.description: Budget allocation per channel with amounts and percentages

reallocation_recommendations.description: Recommendations for budget reallocation based on performance
